(uhm, yeah i meant crotch)
::Tasmanian Kid::
TK fell back, and looked up at Doubelpunch and INjector. He then activated 
his jmupjet, and shot into the air. He then came down, and with his right 
leg, kicked Injector* in the head. He then jumped again, and landed around 
15 feet away fomr him, but then fell down, due to his injured knee.

>From: KSLawdogg@...

>
>(By the "Ahem, where the sun don't shine", I'm assuming you meant 
>Injector's
>crotch, yes?)
>
>Injector/Double Punch/Manterror:
>
>
>Injector grunted at the kick, laughing.  "Pathetic.  Does he think I have
>testicles or something?" Double Punch laughed at this, even though 
>Manterror
>eleased his grip and fell back to the ground, no longer holding TK.
>
>Double Punch wiped at the mech-fluid, getting most of it off his optic
>sensors.
>
>Injector fired off three optic blasts at TK's sternum, laughing.  (Sternum,
>is at bottom of chest)
